display_html:
data Choices = Choices {
  • lang :: [Lang]
  • architecture :: Architecture
  • dataInfo :: DataInfo
  • maps :: Maps
  • optFeats :: OptionalFeatures
  • srsConstraints :: Constraints
  • extLibs :: [ExtLib]
  • icNames :: InternalConcept -> Name
  • folderVal :: Int
}
name: Choices Choices lang architecture dataInfo maps optFeats srsConstraints extLibs icNames folderVal

display_html:
data Architecture = Archt {
  • modularity :: Modularity
  • impType :: ImplementationType
}
name: Architecture Archt modularity impType

display_html:
data Maps = Maps {
  • conceptMatch :: ConceptMatchMap
  • spaceMatch :: SpaceMatch
}
name: Maps Maps conceptMatch spaceMatch

display_html:
data LogConfig = LogConfig {
  • logging :: [Logging]
  • logFile :: FilePath
}
name: LogConfig LogConfig logging logFile

display_html:
data OptionalFeatures = OptFeats {
  • docConfig :: DocConfig
  • logConfig :: LogConfig
  • auxFiles :: [AuxFile]
}
name: OptionalFeatures OptFeats docConfig logConfig auxFiles

display_html:
data AuxFile
  • = SampleInput FilePath
  • | ReadME
name: AuxFile SampleInput ReadME

display_html:
data CodeSpec where
  • CodeSpec :: HasName a => {..} -> CodeSpec
name: CodeSpec CodeSpec purpose sysinfodb inputs background configFiles constants pName authors extInputs derivedInputs outputs execOrder cMap constMap mods

display_html: ($:=) :: (Quantity c, MayHaveUnit c) => c -> CodeExpr -> FuncStmt
data Mod = Mod Name Description [Import] [Class] [Func]
name: Mod Mod

display_html:
data FuncStmt where
  • FAsg :: CodeVarChunk -> CodeExpr -> FuncStmt
  • FAsgIndex :: CodeVarChunk -> Integer -> CodeExpr -> FuncStmt
  • FFor :: CodeVarChunk -> CodeExpr -> CodeExpr -> CodeExpr -> [FuncStmt] -> FuncStmt
  • FForEach :: CodeVarChunk -> CodeExpr -> [FuncStmt] -> FuncStmt
  • FWhile :: CodeExpr -> [FuncStmt] -> FuncStmt
  • FCond :: CodeExpr -> [FuncStmt] -> [FuncStmt] -> FuncStmt
  • FRet :: CodeExpr -> FuncStmt
  • FThrow :: String -> FuncStmt
  • FTry :: [FuncStmt] -> [FuncStmt] -> FuncStmt
  • FContinue :: FuncStmt
  • FDecDef :: CodeVarChunk -> CodeExpr -> FuncStmt
  • FFuncDef :: CodeFuncChunk -> [ParameterChunk] -> [FuncStmt] -> FuncStmt
  • FVal :: CodeExpr -> FuncStmt
  • FMulti :: [FuncStmt] -> FuncStmt
  • FAppend :: CodeExpr -> CodeExpr -> FuncStmt
name: FuncStmt FAsg FAsgIndex FFor FForEach FWhile FCond FRet FThrow FTry FContinue FDecDef FFuncDef FVal FMulti FAppend

display_html:
data StepFill
  • = CallF FunctionIntFill
  • | LoopF (NonEmpty FunctionIntFill) [CodeExpr] (NonEmpty StepFill)
  • | StatementF [CodeVarChunk] [CodeExpr]
name: StepFill CallF LoopF StatementF

display_html:
data ArgumentFill
  • = UserDefinedArgF (Maybe NamedArgument) CodeExpr
  • | BasicF CodeExpr
  • | FnF [ParameterFill] StepFill
  • | ClassF [StateVariable] ClassInfoFill
  • | RecordF [CodeExpr]
name: ArgumentFill UserDefinedArgF BasicF FnF ClassF RecordF

  • | Java
  • | Python
  • | Swift

class AuxiliarySym r => PackageSym r where
  • type Package r
  • package :: ProgData -> [r (Auxiliary r)] -> r (Package r)
name: PackageSym Package package

display_html:
class AuxiliarySym r where
  • type Auxiliary r
  • type AuxHelper r
  • doxConfig :: String -> GOOLState -> Verbosity -> r (Auxiliary r)
  • readMe :: ReadMeInfo -> r (Auxiliary r)
  • sampleInput :: ChunkDB -> DataDesc -> [Expr] -> r (Auxiliary r)
  • optimizeDox :: r (AuxHelper r)
  • makefile :: [FilePath] -> ImplementationType -> [Comments] -> GOOLState -> ProgData -> r (Auxiliary r)
  • auxHelperDoc :: r (AuxHelper r) -> Doc
  • auxFromData :: FilePath -> Doc -> r (Auxiliary r)
name: AuxiliarySym Auxiliary AuxHelper doxConfig readMe sampleInput makefile auxHelperDoc auxFromData optimizeDox

}
